title: Tamil Nadu farmers protest with skulls, bones at Jantar Mantar
title_page: Tamil Nadu farmers protest with skulls, bones at Jantar MantarBiharprabha News | Biharprabha News
text:
New Delhi, July 23 (ANI): Tamil Nadu farmers’ protested in National capital’s Jantar Mantar on Sunday by wearing garland of human bones. Raising their demands of profitable price for their crops and water issue, one of the protestor said Prime Minister promised to link river but didn’t took any step in this regard so far. For the past three months, Tamil Nadu farmers had grabbed nationwide attention by holding protests with garlands of human skulls which they claimed were of dead farmers.
